    • Uses of HibernateDao in com.jsf.conventions.dao.impl

      Classes in com.jsf.conventions.dao.impl that implement HibernateDao 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CustomGenericHibernateDao<T,Id extends java.io.Serializable>
      Non JavaEE dependent Dao for this service work properly an EntityManagerProvider implementation should be provided an example can be found here: https://github.com/rmpestano/conventions-issuetracker-weld/blob/master/src/br/com/triadworks/issuetracker/entitymanager/provider/IssueTrackerProvider.java and here: http://code.google.com/p/jsf-conventions-framework/wiki/services
      class  StatefulGenericHibernateDao<T,Id extends java.io.Serializable> 
      class  StatelessGenericHibernateDao<T,Id extends java.io.Serializable>

      class  BaseCustomServiceImpl<T,K extends java.io.Serializable>
      Non EJB dependent service
      class  BaseServiceImpl<T,K extends java.io.Serializable>
      EJB base service
      class  CustomHibernateService<T,K extends java.io.Serializable>
      Non JavaEE(EJB) dependent Service for this service work properly an EntityManagerProvider implementation should be provided an example can be found here: https://github.com/rmpestano/conventions-issuetracker-weld/blob/master/src/br/com/triadworks/issuetracker/entitymanager/provider/IssueTrackerProvider.java and here: http://code.google.com/p/jsf-conventions-framework/wiki/services
      class  StatefulHibernateService<T,K extends java.io.Serializable>
      Stateful EJB based service
      class  StatelessHibernateService<T,K extends java.io.Serializable>
      Stateless EJB based service
